name: alluxio-enterprise
description:
Alluxio, formerly Tachyon, is the world's first system that unifies disparate storage systems at memory speed. With Alluxio, enterprises can manage data efficiently, accelerate business analytics, and ease the adoption of hybrid cloud. 

 Alluxio Enterprise Edition delivers operational benefits of a stable, high performance system with enterprise features and support for critical deployments. Please refer to https://alluxio.com/docs/enterprise/1.6/en/Alluxio-on-DCOS.html for a detailed operation guide. 

 Release Notes: 
 - Upgrade to version 1.6.0 of Alluxio 
 - Secured deployment enhancements 
 - Alluxio Master UI access 
 - Tiered Storage Support 
 - HA Support 
 - REST API Support
preInstallNotes:
Visit https://alluxio.com/products to obtain a license for Alluxio Enterprise Edition.

Default configuration requires 2 agent nodes each with: CPU: 3 | Memory: 5GB | Disk: 4GB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Master: 1 instance | 2 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 2048 MB Disk

Job master: 1 instance | 1 CPU | 1024 MB MEM | 1 2048 MB Disk

Worker: 1 instance | 2 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 2048 MB Disk 

Job worker: 1 instance | 1 CPU | 1024 MB MEM | 1 2048 MB Disk 

Version 2.0.0-1.6.0 contains breaking changes from previous releases. Upgrading from previous versions is not supported.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Alluxio is being installed!
